summary: This bill, the Book Minimum Tax Repeal Act, aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. Primarily, it seeks to repeal the corporate alternative minimum tax. The bill modifies sections related to this tax, including the calculation of tentative minimum tax, application to general business credits, and introduces conforming amendments across various sections of the code. The changes are slated to apply to taxable years starting after December 31, 2024.
